title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not update accordingly.
EB: The height of the label should automatically adjust based on the selected font size.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to "18 points".
